text: @VaughnHillyard @chrislhayes IMO, Was Mr. Rand Paul speak for himself? he had covid19 and go out without mask, before quarantine? My question is due to Egotistical, selfish, greed, Mr. Rand Paul doesn't care about anybody else? Or he thinks he know best and the experts shouldn't tell hem what to do?
